name: Crybaby's Poem
description:
Follow the life of a crybaby poet who has just hatched from her egg.

Gently guide her in her crybaby life by deciding whose poems she reads.

This is a rather melancholic story, with weird and cryptic metaphors.

Perhaps it is best considered a visual novel, as looks certainly can deceive.

Features
  • 32x16 pixel graphics
  • 3 buttons
  • 50+ poems
  • 500+ words
  • Lots of metaphors
Controls
  • Mouse: Click the buttons on the screen
  • Touch screen: Touch the buttons on the screen
  • Keyboard: Arrow keys
  • Gamepad: D-pad

You can play with any one of the above control methods.

System requirements
  • PC: OpenGL 2 capable graphics card or better. It should run alright on quite low end hardware.
  • Android: Tested on Android 10 and 11. Preliminary findings indicate that it probably won't run on Android 8 or older at the moment.
Who made this?
